website_summaries.verdict: A versatile table that is equipped with a number of handy features and can tilt up to 40°.
pros: This table features 6 different tilt positions so you can quickly adjust to your preference from flat to 40°
The 4 built-in trays can hold a variety of supplies while the handy corkboard and shelf reveal an innovative design
cons: Like other drafting tables, this one can be a bit troublesome to assemble
Be sure to read all instructions carefully

customer_reviews.title: Why even have a tilt feature
customer_reviews.text: This desk was a lot smaller and shorter than I expected, with very little drawer space and surface area. It does look nice but here are my issues: 1. the top shelf is very flimsy and won’t hold much weight, 2. the single drawer is so shallow that even my little cylindrical pencil sharpener won’t fit into it. 3. The tilt up feature is basically useless because the ENTIRE surface area of the desk including the cup holders tilts up all together. I’m constantly struggling with shifting my items around this tiny work space, and literally need another desk to put my stationary items if I ever want to tilt the surface up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk, but a few points to mention...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a very nice desk for drawing, art work. Do yourself a favor and use a small crescent wrench instead of the little wrenches provided. If you install it the way it is shown in the diagram, the drawer will not close all the way and stay open about an inch. Written directions would have been more helpful, but diagrams were fairly clear.

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Easy

Took a while figuring out and scratched the paint a bit trying to do it myself, but eventually got it. Durability is good for the most part, don't tighten anything too tight or try to hold only half the base up, it can cause the metal to warp. When placed properly and used properly, everything is good. The glass shelf can handle 20 lbs, the glass table can handle 25 lbs. I am 5'6", the table is perfect height for me.

customer_reviews.author: Dr. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: I love love love love love, did I say love...my new desk. It was brought to me by "santa"(My hubby still likes that I believe) and I couldn't be happier. The assembly was a piece of cake after the multitude of ikea furniture we put together. The glass is really sturdy. The pencil holders on the side are a little flimsy but I don't need them so I won't mark down a star. This would be a great gift for any artist or crafter. Seriously, all the negative reviewers were probably user error more than it being the desk itself. Do yourself a favor and invest in this desk.
customer_reviews.author: Himechan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, confusing instructions!! But do reccommend! :)
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with this desk!!! It was a gift from my Fiancee, and its amazing!!! I recommend if you have the patience, and determination to see it thru! I had to flip a bar that connects the legs together at the top twice, because I was that confused by the instructions! All in all, it took me about 4.5 hours to assemble on my own with errors. But, I am proud of it, its beautiful! I enjoy sitting at it and working at it as its just the right height for me! I am 5'7" and use a regular wooden dining chair for now. Its also improved the quality of my work, considerably. Thank you!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kotschwar

customer_reviews.title: Great architect's desk
customer_reviews.text: Even better than described by other reviewers. Well-made, sturdy, convenient and extremely practical. You have to put it together, but if I can do it, almost anyone can. The "directions" consist of a series of pictures, but eventually the table got put together. I use it several times a day, and am thankful that I did not get a different one that I was looking at. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Paton

customer_reviews.title: Drawing table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on amazon as it is very difficult to find drafting tables any more, architects use computer programs in our modern world these days . The table arrived on time and was very well packed , I was a little worried given there is quite a lot of glass to protect . When I assembled the table I found it was well built and I thought it was a very good price for what it was designed to do . I do graphite drawings and find all the little side trays so handy . I use every part of this table from the cork board to the shelf above , it is very, very well designed .
customer_reviews.author: Angus

customer_reviews.title: Modern and functional designed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design. Fits in with any decor, yet modern-looking. Love the table slants to a desirable angle on which to draw. Extra top shelf, with cork board and magnets. Storage drawer. Gift for Hubby who draws : now had his own special place. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: debasher

customer_reviews.title: Art studio desk
customer_reviews.text: Started the project at 4:30pm and finished by 7pm. There was two people and one 15 mins break. Fun project to do but glad it is over so I can enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Calderone

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift from my wife to me and my daughter. I wanted a drafting table and she wanted an art table. This desk fits both. So far so good. Since it was a Christmas gift, I cannot speak to its durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Great Value & Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: Just follow the instructions and you're good to go. No problems at all. Everything fits and all parts are there! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: FRANK GILBERT CHAVEZ

customer_reviews.title: Kids appreciate it!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product. We have two. Tools are provided, but some patience is needed to assemble because of the tight spaces to fit screws. 4-stars because the shipping box is not robust enough. The first one came right the first time. The second one was returned twice before the final one arrived without shipping damage.
customer_reviews.author: freonfudge

customer_reviews.title: The table/desk is sturdy, a very good size and very convenient in ...
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised at the value. The table/desk is sturdy, a very good size and very convenient in all the options it provides. A friend put it together for me and said it went together well (when he read the instructions). Both he and his wife were also impressed with the quality of the desk overall.
customer_reviews.author: Wandering the Globe

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, our daughter loves it. Although very well packaged, and no visual damage to the box after shipping, there was a bent part in the box. The bent part is one of the frame members, so I straighten it out and finished assembly. It is just frustrating to go through all hoops of purchasing, and hiding for the holidays, and then find out there are workmanship issues when you are against the kids expectations of their holiday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M Pietri

customer_reviews.title: A delightful experience~
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The table is beautiful and will last a million years; It's very affordable; It is highly adjustable; it has a badass shelf. Cons: It took an extra two days to process; both pieces of glass have clear warning stickers that are way too hard to get off; the assembly takes a while. (On a side note, they also delivered the table to the wrong house, but that's because it's hard to find my house :p) Overall, this table is perfect for me and looks grand! I searched everywhere for a nice glass drafting table, and this one fits my needs exactly, it's very sturdy and it keeps your supplies very organized.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great easy to assemble I would buy it again. Easy to adjust
customer_reviews.author: L.J.

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre and Very difficult to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this item, but am disappointed. The table does not feel "secure" in that the surface moves around a bit when using it to draw/write. More important (to me) was the assembly. An inexpensive consumer product should not, in my opinion, take 3+ hours to assemble. The directions were difficult to follow and not illustrated well. Finally, a couple of small parts (screws/bolts) appear to have been missing (it is also possible that I dropped them and cannot find them, to be fair). The material that comes with the packaging encourages the consumer to call their "friendly" service department number, which, it turns out, is disconnected.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Art Desk!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk so much. Arrived early and safely packaged. Comes with all the tools to put together. All hardware labeled in package making it easy to know what is what.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Emmons

customer_reviews.title: End justifies the process
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to assemble - directions definitely need improvement. But end result is exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.author: EP-4:8

customer_reviews.title: Very solid product, well made.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. She absolutely loves it. She wanted a different brand and I researched it and it did not get good reviews. She was so happy when she got this. Much happier than with the other option she had selected. Very solid product.
customer_reviews.author: nick15520

product_meta.title: Studio Designs Futura Tower, Silver/Blue Glass
product_meta.description: With Studio Designs' Futura Tower, there's a place for everything. Office and arts supplies, notes, photos - the Futura Tower stores it all over a 33 W x 21''D blue tempered safety-glass work surface. Constructed of durable heavy gage steel with a powder-coated finish, the desk features a 24'' x 9'' tower shelf and an extra-large slide-out drawer for storage. The table top adjust to 6 different angles, ranging from 0 to 40 degrees. A 24'' pencil ledge slides up and locks into place when needed. 4 removable art trays, 2 cup holders and a combo magnetic/cork board (4 magnets included) add to its versatility. Floor levelers on each leg provide stability on any surface. Drawer dimensions: 24 W x 10 D. Overall dimensions: 50''W x 22''D x 57''H.
